amendment.description: To expand the Responsibilities of the National Infrastructure Simulation and Analysis Center in the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4598 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4598 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S7498) To expand the Responsibilities of the National Infrastructure Simulation and Analysis Center in the Department of Homeland Security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4598 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4598 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Domenici.
